data.persona: I am the town watchman. I make my rounds down the cobblestone street when everyone is asleep. I am stealthy and alert.
data.description:
You are in the main gate.
The main gate is tall and strong enough to protect the mansion from invaders, and has large wooden doors reinforced by planks and steel sheets. There are two towers on either side of the gate for the town's watchmen to use as their post.
The dogs is here.

You are carrying a telescope, and wearing a Cloak and a mask.

data.short_motivation: I must follow the dogs because the dogs are barking at a potential invader.
data.mid_motivation: I must defeat the potential invader so that the invader cannot report back to his camp.
data.long_motivation: I must make sure the invaders do not receive any intelligence about our fortifications from the invaders' spies.
